Title: Thor: Love and Thunder

Actors: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Christian Bale

Title: Top Gun: Maverick
Plot: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
Writer: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr., Peter Craig
Actors: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller

Title: Beast
Plot: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.
Actors: Liyabuya Gongo, Martin Munro, Daniel Hadebe

Title: Pinocchio
Plot: A puppet is brought to life by a fairy, who assigns him to lead a virtuous life in order to become a real boy.

Actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Tom Hanks, Benjamin Evan Ainsworth

Title: Nope
Plot: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

Title: Platoon
Plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: Where the Crawdads Sing
Plot: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man she was once involved with.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
